interval_analysis: Perfect 4ths: P4, P4, P4 stacked intervals
frequency_analysis: Perfect 4th ratio 4:3 (498 cents) creates hollow, open sound through harmonic series gaps
beat_frequency_implications: Minimal beating due to perfect ratio alignment; creates spacious acoustic texture

interval_analysis: Perfect 5ths: P5, P5, P5 stacked intervals
frequency_analysis: Perfect 5th ratio 3:2 (702 cents) - most consonant compound interval after octave
beat_frequency_implications: Near-zero beating creates pure, ringing sustain; powerful acoustic foundation
harmonic_series_position: 2nd and 3rd harmonic relationship creates natural acoustic reinforcement

interval_analysis: Minor 2nds: m2, m2, m2 chromatic saturation
frequency_analysis: Minor 2nd ratio 16:15 (111 cents) creates maximum acoustic density
beat_frequency_implications: High beat frequency (1-10 Hz) creates tremolo effect and acoustic roughness
harmonic_series_position: Adjacent harmonic series positions create maximum interference patterns
